core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Medical Trust with Tech Innovation
Emotion First: Every pixel must build trust and safety
Content is King: Data and Health info must be legible and clear
Zoom In: Focus on the details of medicine and care
Negative Space: Generous breathing room for clarity
anti_patterns: No 'Inter' for headings - use characterful fonts
No center-everything - use asymmetry for interest
No gradient overload - use subtle, functional gradients

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all H1-H6. Weights: Bold (700) or ExtraBold (800). Tracking: tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use 'Inter' for all paragraphs and UI text. Weights: Regular (400) or Medium (500). Line-height: relaxed (1.6).
usage_rules.accent: Use 'Fraunces' for testimonials, quotes, or 'Trusted By' sections to add warmth and authority.

accent.description: Cyan/Teal for AI and Smart features

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Primary. Use 'Medical Blue' (#0066FF) for primary actions. Use 'Cyan' (#06B6D4) for AI/Tech features. Backgrounds should be clean white or very light blue-grey (#F8FAFC). Dark mode should be deep slate (#0F172A), not pure black.

grids.bento_marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-8 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-6 md:gap-8

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-11 px-4 rounded-lg font-medium transition-all

cards.marketing: bg-white rounded-3xl border border-slate-100 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/50 p-8 hover:shadow-2xl hover:shadow-slate-200/60 transition-all duration-300
cards.dashboard: bg-white rounded-xl border border-slate-200 shadow-sm p-6

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

navigation.header: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-slate-100 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-xl supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-white/60
navigation.sidebar: fixed left-0 top-0 z-40 h-screen w-64 border-r border-slate-200 bg-white

rules: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, nav)
All images must have alt text
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary)
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + text)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: Run 'yarn add framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot class-variance-authority' if not present.
2. SETUP FONTS: Add 'Plus Jakarta Sans' and 'Inter' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
3. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the colors and border radius defined above.
4. CREATE COMPONENTS: Build the UI using the 'components' rules. Do not use default Shadcn styles blindly; customize them to match the 'Medical Blue' theme.
5. IMPLEMENT LAYOUTS: Use the 'Bento' grid for the landing page and 'High Density' grid for dashboards.
6. ADD MOTION: Apply framer-motion to all major sections (fade-in, slide-up).
7. USE IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for their respective sections.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
